Uses of Package
org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.service

  • Packages that use org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.service 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.config  
    org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.controller  
    org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.service  
    org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.statemachine  
  • Classes in org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.service used by org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.config 
    Class and Description
    DeployerInitializationService
    Populates the DeployerRepository with AppDeployer instances
    PackageMetadataService
    Downloads package metadata from known repositories and deletes PackageMetadata.
    PackageService
    Service responsible for downloading package .zip files and loading them into the Package object.
    ReleaseReportService 
    ReleaseService
    Service responsible for the lifecycle of packages and releases, install/delete a package, upgrade/rollback a release, and get status on a release.
    ReleaseStateUpdateService
    Service which schedules background updates for applications known to ReleaseRepository.
    RepositoryInitializationService
    Takes repository application configuration properties and update the Repository database on application startup.
  • Classes in org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.service used by org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.controller 
    Class and Description
    PackageMetadataService
    Downloads package metadata from known repositories and deletes PackageMetadata.
    PackageService
    Service responsible for downloading package .zip files and loading them into the Package object.
    ReleaseService
    Service responsible for the lifecycle of packages and releases, install/delete a package, upgrade/rollback a release, and get status on a release.
